"Guiden": "Oh, it's you. I hear you've been busy lately."
"Hm... You look like you're getting even stronger."
"So you've ventured to Kvaris as well?"
"You probably don't need it at this point, but I can offer some advice again if you'd like."
"All the ARKS are excited to see what you can accomplish. Take care out there."
"Welcome. Let's cut to the chase right away, why don't we."
"I'd like to tell you about Special Ability Capsules."
"Although someone as strong as you is probably already well aware..."
"If you'd like, I can teach you what I know."
"If you have yet to make fine adjustments to your weaponry while upgrading them, now is the best time to learn."
"You may decide which capsules to make use of. Give it a try."
"Next I want you to apply a capsule to a piece of equipment at the item lab."
"I'll let you pick which capsules and gear. Just don't go too wild with things."
"That's alright, don't force yourself. If you ever want to know more about them, you know where to go."
